text: And he told her, “Bring the shawl you are wearing and hold it out.” When she did so, he shoveled six measures of barley 3:15 Possibly six seahs (two ephahs), or approximately 39.6 dry quarts or 43.8 liters (about 58 pounds or 26.3 kilograms of barley)  into her shawl. Then he went 3:15 Most Hebrew manuscripts; many Hebrew manuscripts, Vulgate, and Syriac she went into the city.
